author: Gab Hernandez
description:
Warhammer: Age of Sigmar hammers home the conflict between Order and Chaos even further than its predecessor. The forces of Chaos, though with new names and ways to main, are still strikingly familiar. You have the typical bloodthirsty Khornates, the smug Tzeentch acolytes, the ever-down-bad Slaneesh cultists, and the stinking spawn of Nurgle (plus a few trillion talking rats). The latest to join the fray are the Helsmiths of Hashut, the AoS counterpart of the Chaos Dwarves.

Continue reading You can win Warhammer Age of Sigmar's new Chaos Dwarfs army free from GW
MORE FROM WARGAMER: Warhammer Age of Sigmar armies guide,
title: You can win Warhammer Age of Sigmar's new Chaos Dwarfs army free from GW

author: Gab Hernandez
description:
Despite the legions of copycats, Cyberpunk remains the quintessential tabletop RPG for the genre. Given the name, it better be. The latest version of the TTRPG, Cyberpunk RED, acts as a prequel to Cyberpunk 2077, making it the perfect starting point for fans of the video game.

Continue reading Classic tabletop RPG Cyberpunk RED gets solo mode, and a Night City sourcebook
MORE FROM WARGAMER: The best tabletop RPGs, D&D classes guide, Pathfinder classes guide
title: Classic tabletop RPG Cyberpunk RED gets solo mode, and a Night City sourcebook
